title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Solving the Cloud Privilege Problem at Scale: A Fiserv Case Study (COP213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模解决云特权问题：Fiserv案例研究 (COP213)
abstract: This session explores how Fiserv, a global leader in financial services technology, transformed its cloud identity security & governance strategy by deploying Sonrai's Cloud Permissions Firewall. Facing challenges across 900+ AWS accounts, including overprivileged identities, uncontrolled access to AI services, limited visibility into 3rd-party access & fragmented tools, Fiserv required a scalable, proactive approach. Attendees will learn how automation, centralized dashboards, & advanced identity controls enabled Fiserv to remediate 1000s of identity risks, get AI access under control, achieve compliance readiness, & reduce operational risk. The case study demonstrates practical strategies for securing enterprise-scale cloud environments. This presentation is brought to you by Sonrai Security, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨了全球金融服务技术领导者Fiserv如何通过部署Sonrai的云权限防火墙来转变其云身份安全与治理策略。面对900多个AWS账户的挑战，包括过度特权身份、对AI服务的无控制访问、对第三方访问的有限可见性以及工具碎片化，Fiserv需要一种可扩展的主动方法。与会者将了解自动化、集中式仪表板和高级身份控制如何使Fiserv能够修复数千个身份风险、控制AI访问、实现合规就绪并降低运营风险。该案例研究展示了保护企业级云环境的实用策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Sonrai Security提供。
